p.e:
The base resources in Hello
Kingdoms are described as 'hard'
objects, meaning that they must be
transported to a building and put
inside it by units.
A standard infantry unit can carry
3 coins or 1 oil at a time (for more
on transportation, continue reading) .

Resources in buildings can be
used to produce:
-What the building can afford
-What it is allowed to make

A unit can only be produced at
appropriate buildings, e.g.
vehicles can only be produced
at vehicle factories.
